price: 19. Kasi baye bandima mpe bazali kosala misala milamu, bakozalaka na lola, libela mpe bakofutaka bango тропа maye basalaki.
arabic: أَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتُ ٱلۡمَأۡوَىٰ نُزُلَۢا بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: ammā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti falahum jannātu al-mawā nuzulan bimā kānū yaʿmalūna
